document_data.name: Sunset Plague
document_data.outbreak: [[Calimport]], [[-3332 DR]]<ref group="note" name="dating error">''[[The Grand History of the Realms]]'' claims that the [[Sunset Plague]] and the devastation of the [[Marekh Dynasty]] occurred ''circa'' [[-4770 DR]], but this is an error. It is a result of merging the entries for -4770 and -3332 DR in the timeline provided on p. 14 of the [[Calimport (sourcebook)|''Calimport'']] sourcebook.
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sunset Plague''' was a fatal [[disease]] that nearly destroyed the city of [[Calimport]] in {{Yearlink|-3332}}.<ref group="note" name="dating error" />
document_data.History:
Almost everyone in Calimport was killed by the Sunset Plague after less than one [[tenday]]. This included more than half of the ruling [[Marekh Dynasty|Marekh family]], leaving [[Daud el Marekh|Daud yn Khadil el Marekh]]—a ship captain—to assume the throne.

Fear of the plague meant that the city lay abandoned for a century following the outbreak. With their capital lost, the power of the Marekh Dynasty was irrevocably broken, and it dissolved just [[-3320 DR|twelve years later]].
